title: Reset admin credentials to new username and password

requirements.text: Update the hardcoded admin credentials in the backend so that the username is 'Azadnexus.global@gmail.com' and the password is 'Karusu_7'. The validateAdmin function must accept these new credentials and return a valid session access key on success.
acceptanceCriteria: Calling validateAdmin with username 'Azadnexus.global@gmail.com' and password 'Karusu_7' returns a valid session access key.
Calling validateAdmin with any other username/password combination returns an error or null.
The admin login page at /admin/login accepts the new credentials and redirects to the admin dashboard on success.

constraints: Do not change any other backend logic, data models, or frontend components beyond what is needed to update the admin credentials.
nonGoals: Changing the session access key mechanism
